name: [group 14] SPANK 'N SPLASH
description:
Hey there! 

You like spanking? You like being wet? Well this game is maybe for you! 

Are you ready for the most ultimate, summer vibed, weirdly sexual spanking fun you have ever seen?

Take a towel and let that baby whip your opponent to force them into the water. 

What is this madness? 

Dash and walk around in our beautiful pool resort and push each other in the pool by spanking, throwing with water balloons and launching sharks! Wait wat? 

You heared me! Launching sharks!
